results.name: Number of trailing 1-bits in the binary representation of A318466(n), where A318466(n) = 2*n OR sigma(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
mathematica: Array[LengthWhile[Reverse@ IntegerDigits[BitOr[2 #, DivisorSigma[1, #]], 2], # == 1 &] &, 105] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 30 2019 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 28 2019
